text: Mia Gypsy Mello da Silva Goth (born 25 October 1993) is a British actress. She is known for playing Maxine Minx and Pearl in the X movie series (2022â€“2024). Her first well known roles were in Nymphomaniac (2013), Suspiria (2018), and Emma (2020). Goth has been in a domestic partnership with actor Shia LaBeouf.
